description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9r9bt","text":"Switch the flowcell to another sequencer if first base fails - HiSeq","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ak68","text":"If a rapid run has failed at first base and you want to switch the flowcell to another side or sequencer, follow these steps (ONLY applicable to single read runs, changing sequencer for paired end run is not possible)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":125,"length":92},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":125,"length":92}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eplv9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ncdn","text":"These steps are to be performed on the HiSeq where the flow cell is being moved.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":80}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6pe6v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tpm4","text":"Wash the sequencer that will be used (MWB and then water). [Link to wash protocol]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3evam","text":"Load the SBS rack (with reagents) to the sequencer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1a01h","text":"Load water in the Paired End rack and the template tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":5,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1a44p","text":"Place a dummy flowcell on the deck. Engage vacuum.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"48v19","text":"Setup the run as normally you would, but select “cluster generation on cbot.” even if it was onboard clustering.  This will save an additional hour of time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hb5a","text":"Enter the other parameters used for the flowcell, such as read lengths, flowcell ID, etc...This will create the files needed to allow you to do a rehyb later.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cimvu","text":"Start the run and wait for the first base report to come up. End the run.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"v0rf","text":"Thaw a Rehybridization kit and replace or top-off the reagents according to the “HiSeq Rapid Primer Rehybridization Reference Guide.” A general summary is below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"450sp","text":"For Single-Read Runs, replace/top-off the following reagents with these from the Rehyb kit:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0qns","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"774ub","text":"     Position      Reagent      Description        5      USB      Add   to current USB bottle        18      HP10      Replaces   Read1 primer        17      HP12      Replaces   Index1 primer (i7)        16      HP9      Replaces   Index2 primer (i5)   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":255}],"data":{}},{"key":"bpfpv","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[77,119,153],"data":[["  Position  ","  Reagent  ","  Description  "],["  5  ","  USB  ","  Add
  to current USB bottle  "],["  18  ","  HP10  ","  Replaces
  Read1 primer  "],["  17  ","  HP12  ","  Replaces
  Index1 primer (i7)  "],["  16  ","  HP9  ","  Replaces
  Index2 primer (i5)  "]],"guid":"93D16E5A8F3D11EC94500A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["  Position  ","  Reagent  ","  Description  "],["  5  ","  USB  ","  Add
  to current USB bottle  "],["  18  ","  HP10  ","  Replaces
  Read1 primer  "],["  17  ","  HP12  ","  Replaces
  Index1 primer (i7)  "],["  16  ","  HP9  ","  Replaces
  Index2 primer (i5)  "]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2bjh","text":"Leave the dummy flowcell on the sequencer. You will prime following reagent twice: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3q5ga","text":"FDR (position 15) - aspiration rate of 1500, dispense rate of 2000, and using 250uL","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46hs4","text":"Flow USB (5) - aspiration rate of 1500, dispense rate of 2000, and using 250uL ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5917d","text":"Return to the Main screen and select “Sequence,” then “Rehyb Run.” ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpe2m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eios0","text":"Replace the dummy flowcell with sequencing flowcell and proceed with rehybridization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Rapid Run v2 Primer Rehyb
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"5r828","text":"ONLY applicable to single read runs, changing sequencer for paired end run is not possible","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":90},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":90}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
